Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 500 pixels, file size: 4 KB)

Summary[edit]

Cymraeg: Baner Ynys y Nadolig
Français : Drapeau de l'île Christmas. Proportions 1:2
Kernowek: Baner Ynys Nadelik
Flag of Christmas Island*
country Christmas Island
used by Christmas Island
current since 2002-01-26
created by Tony Couch
format 1:2
shape
12 ↑
colors green, gold, white, blue
other characteristics flag contains 5 stars (special formation of the stars: Southern Cross).

flag includes depiction of the animal/plant Phaethon lepturus fulvus
flag includes a map of the territory of Christmas Island

Flag of Christmas Island, from the xrmap flag collection 2.7.

Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse
I, the copyright holder of this work, release this work into the public domain. This applies worldwide.
In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
I grant anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it.
